brain_inspired.name: Nando de Freitas
brain_inspired.title: BI 040 Nando de Freitas: Enlightenment, Compassion, Survival
brain_inspired.text: Nando is a principal scientist at Deepmind and has an appointment at CIFAR, the Canadian Institute for Advanced Research. We talk about why he studies artificial intelligence, many of his current projects advancing machine learning in modern challenging areas like meta-learning, teaching machines how to program other machines, training networks using few training examples, and more.
